item.title: My obsidian note-taking system
item.description: My obsidian note-taking system Obsidian controls Search/Create notes (⌘ + p) Command Palette (⌘ +⇧ + P) GIT Slides Admonition Insert templates (⌘ +t ) Tags draft - ([[#Digital garden]] visibility) VIM-like motion Sidebar L(⌘ + ⇧ + B) - R (⌘ + ⇧ + X) Highlight (⌘ + h) Plugins [[Obsidian Excalidraw Plugin]] Drawing Linking Drawing Libraries Embed drawing [[Obsidian Outliner]] Configuration [[Obsidian Templater]] [[Obsidian Dataview]] [[Kindle]] Admonition What and how I use Obsidian for?
